entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , St. Lawrence
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 01:11 AM NST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 6.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: St. Lawrence 03:30 AM NST Saturday 14 January 2023
Temperature: 6.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.4 kPa falling
Humidity: 100 %
Dewpoint: 5.9°C
Wind: SSW 40 km/h gust 58 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Rain or snow. Temperature rising to 8 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning early this evening then changing to rain late this evening. Fog patches developing near midnight. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Rainfall amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming south 60 gusting to 80 near midnight. Temperature rising to 8 by morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Showers. Temperature steady near 9.
entry.summary: Showers. Fog patches. Amount 5 mm. Wind south 60 km/h gusting to 80 diminishing to 40 gusting to 60 near noon. Temperature steady near 9. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Friday 13 January 2023
